It's heavy enough that you can wear it on chilly nights, but not so heavy that you can't wear it in the summer.

评论详情: Larger than a regular LARGE size, and also, it might be good for a very tall person, but the quality of this denim shirt is good. This is the first time I have ordered a Lee Brand product and I must say that it could be great for someone who’s planning to wear it as a working uniform, but not for a casual everyday use. Unfortunately, I must return this shirt back Amazon, cause this brand sizes are made much larger than usual sizes for any other brand.

类型: Size: SmallColor: Denim Medium Wash Indigo
评论详情: Based on other reviews, i ordered a medium.  I tried it on when it arrived and it was a little boxy for me so I returned it and ordered the small.  The replacement took only 2 days, super quick.The shirt is made from material that is nice and thick but not too thick to be bulky.  It is on the softer side and very comfortable.  The color is a nice light blue.  I am very happy with the shirt.  I had searched in many different stores for a comfortable denim shirt for months but nothing was quite right in terms of color and fabric.  I plan to put together several outfits with this shirt.  Quality item.
